line.text: A woman face with nature own hand painted
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Hast thou the master mistress of my passion
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: A woman gentle heart but not acquainted
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: With shifting change as is false women fashion
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: An eye more bright than theirs less false in rolling
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Gilding the object whereupon it gazeth
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: A man in hue all hues in his controlling
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which steals men eyes and women souls amazeth
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And for a woman wert thou first created
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Till nature as she wrought thee fell a-doting
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And by addition me of thee defeated
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: By adding one thing to my purpose nothing
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But since she pricked thee out for women pleasure
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Mine be thy love and thy love use their treasure
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
